docs.abstract: Rutgers football team dismisses quarterback Philip Nelson following his arrest in connection with an assault on Isaac Kolstad, former fellow linebacker, outside a bar in Mankato, Minn; Kolstad remains in critical condition.

docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Wednesday that Jim Donnan lured his friends into a fraudulent investment scheme because he was blinded by the enormous amount of money he could make, while defense attorneys argued the former University of Georgia football coach was duped and thought he was presenting them with a great opportunity.
